shortdesc.ph: The type of the audio track.

plentry.pd: 0: Mixable audio tracks. 当你创建了多个可混流的音频轨道时，你可以将这些音频轨道发布到同一个频道中，SDK 会自动将多个音频轨道混合成一个音频轨道。 The latency of mixable audio tracks is higher than that of direct audio tracks.
1: Direct audio tracks. 当你创建了多个非混流的音频轨道时，每个音频轨道仅支持发布到单个频道中。 The latency of direct audio tracks is lower than that of mixable audio tracks.
